text.text: People say this restaurant serves delicious chicken and waffles, breakfast tacos, and candied bacon. They highlight the fun and trendy atmosphere, and the friendly staff. They also like the excellent coffee and lattes.

People say this restaurant serves delicious duck, lamb, salmon, and ribeye, as well as a variety of appetizers and cocktails. They highlight the relaxed atmosphere, perfect for date nights or special occasions, and the attentive, knowledgeable, and friendly service. They also like the cozy and inviting interior design.

People say this restaurant offers tasty tacos, creative cocktails, and a good selection of wines and local beers. They highlight the reasonable prices, fun and quirky atmosphere, and the unique art displayed throughout the space. They also like the friendly and knowledgeable staff, and the quick service.

People say this restaurant serves delicious brisket, catfish, and fried green tomatoes. They also highlight the generous portions, reasonable prices, and friendly staff.

Other reviews mention the food can be underseasoned.

places.formattedAddress: 319 W 21st St Suite A, Norfolk, VA 23517

displayName.text: The Ghent • Self-Pour Gastropub • Roof Top Bar & Event Venue

text.text: People say this restaurant offers a wide selection of beers, ciders, and wines, as well as delicious burgers, wings, and appetizers. They highlight the rooftop bar's spacious and fun atmosphere, perfect for parties and events, and the friendly and helpful staff. They also like the self-pour system and the availability of board games.

People say this restaurant offers delicious wings, salmon bites, mac and cheese, fish and chips, and lemon drop martinis, especially during happy hour. They also highlight the great music and lively atmosphere.

Some reviews mention the service can be slow.

Diners say this restaurant serves up delicious jerk pasta with salmon, salmon egg rolls, and seafood mac and cheese. They also highlight the strong drinks, friendly staff, and intimate atmosphere.

Some reviews mention the food can be overpriced.

People say this restaurant serves delicious burgers, steak frites, and she-crab soup. They also highlight the generous portions, tasty drinks, and the cozy, intimate atmosphere, perfect for a date night or a gathering with friends.

Other reviews mention the service can be slow.

People say this Southern restaurant offers delicious gluten-free dishes, including fried green tomatoes, shrimp and grits, and bread pudding. They highlight the creative and high-quality food, and the open kitchen. They also like the attentive staff and the chill, conversational atmosphere.

displayName.text: The Restaurant at Four Eleven York

text.text: People say this fine dining restaurant serves delicious food and cocktails, including a caviar experience and a bartender's choice cocktail. They highlight the intimate and romantic atmosphere, and the charming patio and inn spaces. They also like the attentive and friendly service.

People say this restaurant serves delicious burgers, sweet potato fries, and a Beyond Burger. They also highlight the great service, fun and friendly staff, and the wide variety of menu options, including craft burgers, sandwiches, and appetizers.

Other reviews mention the food can be cold.

People say this restaurant serves delicious food and cocktails. They highlight the nice bar area, wonderful patio space, and dimly lit dining area, creating a great ambiance. They also like the welcoming staff and fast service.

People say this restaurant serves delicious burgers, pork belly, and cornbread pudding. They highlight the unique cocktails, fresh ingredients, and creative execution of dishes. They also like the attentive service and cozy atmosphere.

People say this restaurant serves delicious seafood, including calamari, and flavorful meatloaf. They also highlight the reasonable prices, fun vibe, and friendly staff.

Other reviews mention the service can be slow.

People say this restaurant serves delicious salmon, shrimp and grits, crab cakes, and meatloaf. They highlight the generous portions, reasonable prices, and fun, eclectic atmosphere. They also like the quick and friendly service.

People say this restaurant serves delicious brunch dishes, including shrimp and grits, and creative cocktails. They highlight the vibrant atmosphere, the beautiful outdoor patio, and the reasonable prices. They also like the friendly and attentive staff.

People say this restaurant serves delicious mac and cheese, sauteed kale, crab cakes, burgers, salmon, and jumbo wings. They also highlight the amazing drinks, fresh ingredients, and chill, cozy, and vibrant atmosphere.

Some reviews mention the service can be slow.
